cab.content: (This Document Is the Property ofMis Britannic MajestyVGovernment)i ti2SEC RETx 0BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 29 th'JUNE, 1918.1 c IJESTERN FRONT .-There is no change in the general situation on the British Front *On the French Front, two counter-attack a v/ere made last night by the Germans to recover the ground in the neighbour-hood of FOSSEr-EN-EAS and CUTRY wliich r/as taken by the French yesterday momingo Both attacks v/ere completely repulsed o2, ITALIAN FRONT.There is notlthing of interest to report.General Staff,War Office, S*i.r.la ' 29th June, .1918,,.Issued'at 6^d p.nuit
